Test Name: Prolonged Clot Time Profile (PT, APTT, TT and related assays)
Purpose: To investigate and interpret prolonged clotting times, identifying coagulation factor deficiencies or inhibitors to aid in the diagnosis and management of hemostatic disorders.
Equipment: Centrifuge and automated coagulation analyzer (e.g., Sysmex CS-5100 or STAGO STA-R)
